code: import React from"react";import MyPost from"./MyPost";import{connect}from"react-redux";import{addPost}from"../../../../Redux/postCreatReducer";var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{currentPost:state.post.currentPost,postsArr:state.post.postsArr};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,{addPost:addPost})(MyPost);
